about_the_game:
Eternal Edge + Prologue is a casual Action Adventure Role-Playing game. This prologue allows you to enjoy the beginning of the Eternal Edge + experience before buying the full game! Features 2-3 hours of gameplay including the Intro, first Major Dungeon, 3 Sub-Dungeons, and free exploration time of 'the Expanse'.

Save data will be carried over to the full game, so you don't have to worry about losing your hard-earned progress.

Features

  • Travel to far off lands
  • Fight Epic Monsters
  • Uncover mysterious areas
  • And save the good people from a reign of evil!

short_description: Eternal Edge + is a casual Action-Adventure role-playing game following Cross, an Age-old warrior who is trying to wake his lost Wife from an Eternal slumber. Only together can they defeat the Skeleton King.
